## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d30c7b91e8bbf434aa10762bff4148e83d80a714b10456cce7ba248b85021dde)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'coronavirus-calculator' @ 2.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
